meanings.sent1: The toughened steel could withstand great pressure.
meanings.sent2: The toughened glass did not shatter when it fell.
meanings.sent3: The toughened superhero could lift heavy objects effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her toughened resolve helped her overcome all obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The toughened fabric was nearly indestructible.

meanings.sent1: The metal toughened after being heated and cooled.
meanings.sent2: His attitude toughened as he faced more challenges.
meanings.sent3: The butter toughened in the fridge and was hard to spread.
meanings.sent4: His heart toughened after experiencing betrayal.
meanings.sent5: The leather toughened with age, becoming more durable.

meanings.sent1: The toughened plastic was able to withstand extreme temperatures.
meanings.sent2: The toughened walls of the fortress protected the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The toughened shoes lasted for years without wearing out.
meanings.sent4: The toughened bond between them never broke.
meanings.sent5: The toughened paint on the car prevented rusting.
